name: SOUTH WESTERN FISH PRODUCER ORGANISATION LTD
goal: Ensure fishing is carried out along rational lines and that conditions for the sale of members' produce is maximised. Take measures as will promote for the benefit of members the implementation of fishing plans, the concentration of supply and stability of price in full accord with the objectives contained in the common fisheries policy. Apply production and marketing rules adopted to maximise production. Draw up and implement a catch plan. Sustain the standard of quality of products, establish quality control methods and classify products in conformity with EU and UK legislation.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: All that body of legislation known as the Common Fisheries Policy
